title: 1996년 Pickens 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Pickens. 판결일: 1996-07-03. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: The People of the State of New York v. Ivan M. Pickens, Also Known as Kamel
**판결일**: 1996-07-03
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

**판사**: Peters

## 인용

- 229 A.D.2d 607
- 645 N.Y.S.2d 559

## 판결문 요약


Peters, J.
Appeal from a judgment of the County Court of Albany County (Turner, Jr., J.), rendered October 1, 1993, upon a verdict convicting defendant of the crime of robbery in the second degree.
Defendant is charged with robbing Anthony Haggray of a gold chain at gunpoint on October 31, 1990 while he was standing on the street in the City of Albany. Haggray reported this incident to the police a few days later, which resulted in defendant’s arrest on November 26, 1990 and ultimate conviction by a jury of the crime of robbery in the second degree. Upon the denial of defendant’s motion, after hearing, to set aside the verdict (see, CPL 30.30), defendant was sentenced as a second felony offender to an indeterminate term of imprisonment of 71/2 to 15 years.
...
